item.title: Logging with Elasticsearch, Fluent Bit, and Kibana (EFK)
item.description: Implement Logging with EFK In this Chapter, we will deploy a common Kubernetes logging pattern which consists of the following: Fluent Bit: an open source and multi-platform Log Processor and Forwarder which allows you to collect data/logs from different sources, unify and send them to multiple destinations. It’s fully compatible with Docker and Kubernetes environments. Amazon Elasticsearch Service: a fully managed service that makes it easy for you to deploy, secure, and run Elasticsearch cost effectively at scale.
